title: How can we improve our breathing while singing during music lessons? - Quora

response.answer_text: One should inhale a long breath before starting a song so that there would be sufficient oxygen inside our body during singing any song. If you have enough oxygen inside your body then it would help to sing the lengthy lines in a song by exhaling oxygen slowly-slowly and using it to take larger scales. Also, whenever you're taking a tiny break in between ending and starting the new line, repeat the same procedure of inhaling and exhaling. Try it, it works really well..

Breathing exercises like pranayama and having a good cardio based exercises routine itself is very helpful for having long . Practicing the alnkaram swara pattern and having a good control over the splitting of words by understanding the meaning of the song can also help to regulate when to cut and take breath while singing is in progress. You can listen to expert singers like sanjay subramnyam on their techniques of prana kattu for more understanding.
